actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-1010.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 398 - 0 (Record Vote No: 403).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3082) to promote the conservation of migratory waterfowl and to offset or prevent the serious loss of wetlands by the acquisition of wetlands and other essential habitat, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3082 (wetlands conservation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3082) to promote the conservation of migratory waterfowl and to offset or prevent the serious loss of wetlands by the acquisition of wetlands and other essential habitat, and for other purposes.
